channel.title: Tutorial: Receive an email when an ERC-20 transfer occurs
channel.description:
Today we'll learn how to create a JavaScript application that send an email when an ERC-20 transfer occurs on Ethereum.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/receive-email-when-there-is-an-erc20-transfer/
